page.title: 20SUMMARY & CREDITS
page.content:
Braishfield is a dormitory type village,trying hard to encourage the younger inhabitants to remain, but the high cost of property is a deterrent. Industry is at a minimum,but the arboretum and nurseries attract many visitors,especially in the spring when the rhodedendrons and azaleas are in bloom.The woods at Ampfield are popular with walkers and horse-riders.
This part of the survey has been compiled by the following members of North Baddesley Womens Institute- Mrs.T.Bulling Mrs.E.Randall Mrs.D.Stapleford Mrs.J.Trimboy Mrs.J.Trundle Mrs.J.Vaughan (Photographer)
October 1985
